Text: k from DSGMr Lay A group of former DSG employees have tried to receive information about the status of our DSG ks We were promised that our accounts would be supervested and then moved to Enrons k plan We expected this change to take at the most months It has been two years We were told on several occasions that our accounts had been supervested and we were waiting on Enron to move the accounts We are now being told that our AUL accounts can not be moved and in fact are frozen Marla Barnard was our HR representative at the time of the acquisition She has directed my questions to Mike Rath in Benefits who has never responded Can someone please explain why the supervesting and moving of the funds did not occur the rules associated with the account freeze and why we are not receiving our statements from AUL Debbie Beavers Original Message From Barnard Marla Sent Wednesday September PM To Rath Mikie Cc Beavers Debbie Subject FW k from DSG Mikie can you please respond to Debbies question below thanks Original Message From Beavers Debbie Sent Wednesday September PM To Barnard Marla Subject RE k from DSG I did not receive any info from Mikie Rath Does this mean that I can not borrow from my AUL k The majority of my money years came from Amoco not DSG Does that matter Original Message From Barnard Marla Sent Wednesday September PM To Beavers Debbie Subject RE k from DSG Debbie I forwarded this message to Mikie Rath in benefits did you get a response If not I do have some info I can provide but she would need to assist you with any particular details Please see below I just learned recently that it does not appear much of this info was communicated to DSG employees after the acquisition The assets contained within the DSG k plan cannot be transferred to the Enron plan because the plan was never authorized by the IRS Prior DSG employees cannot transfer funds out of the AUL k into a self directed IRA because Enron purchased the assets of DSG Therefore termination applies to Enron employment not employment by DSG in regards to transfer of said assets to a self directed account The DSG plan with AUL will remain intact and Enron will pay all associated administrative fees until all employees represented by the plan are no longer in employed by Enron Since the plan is frozen vesting service should continue to accrue as long as the employee remains with Enron Only if the plan is terminated does super vesting occur The purchase agreement may have assumed that the plan was going to be terminated which could explain that language Original Message From Beavers Debbie Sent Tuesday September AM To Barnard Marla Subject k from DSG Marla I am a former employee of DSG We were purchased by Enron Dec of We were promised that our Ks would be moved to Enrons k plan This has never happened I no longer receive AUL k company statements AUL claims that it sends the statements to the administrator of the plan at Enron I would really like to transfer my money to Enrons k or at least receive a statement of my account at AUL Thanks Debbie Beavers
